snippet: Europe’s Socialist standard-bearer, President François Hollande, who campaigned against austerity policies, has received praise from the European Union and Germany for his plan to reduce spending.
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande, in an about-face on economic policy, proposes to take France in a centrist direction with tax cuts for companies, reductions in public spending and a business-friendly tone; his plans to reduce spending draw accolades and encouragement from European Union and Germany.

byline.contributor: Maïa de la Baume contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Europe’s Socialist standard-bearer, President François Hollande, who campaigned against austerity policies, has received praise from the European Union and Germany for his plan to reduce spending.

headline.main: French Leader’s Policy Proposals Seek Centrist Path
headline.print_headline: French Leader’s Policy Proposals Seek Centrist Path
